The excecuter is like a shotgun (2 bullet kill in close range), 5 bullet mag(?), it has no range and the reload time is slow. Third, you have to pay A POINT, to get the pistol, same with every gun in the game (aside from the defaults). Seeing as kids use pistols in anything from long range, to close range, they aren’t as weak as you are stating. As for you comparing the strength to mag size, a 15 round mag is plenty more then the 5 round mag of a shotgun, yet they are equally powerful, compared to a vector at 48 (i think), or most mg’s at 30-60. item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

No, I wasn’t debating that. I was debating what you claim are facts, you can’t suddenly chang what you stated as a fact.
Knifing, I’m not sure about. I use the tactical layout, I don’t panic knife.
You get 10 points to spend, if pistols were bad nobody would want to use them. They only overpower primary guns in certain situations against weaker classed primary guns (i.e. the b23r would overpower the m27 in close range however the m8a1 would overpower it; in long range all pistols get overpowered exl the use of modded controllers).
Pistols cannot beat any MG(bit vague, machine gun, did you mean SMG?), the guns can only perform as well as the user if your constantly loosing to pistols you mustn’t be very good. Pistols are no longer meant to be used as a last resort, their meant to be used with snipers, specialised classes, shotguns and of course as a last resort.
Snipers cannot shoot a clip in a second, the semi automatic sniper rifles do have a fairly fast fire rate but other factors doesn’t make that overpowered. Their aren’t many lines of site for snipers, maps for the most part are fairly small, the semi-automatic ones aren’t automatic obviously and social factors which put people like myself of using them as it is considered an ‘asshole tactic’. They are of course a powerful weapon but they are not overpowered. The zoom time for the snipers are pretty slow exl the semi-autos, even the dsr-50 has a pretty bad zoom in time.
The guns in this game are powerful, you don’t play the mw series so of course you wouldn’t be used to it.
I have a fair few grammatical mistakes and missed out parts I should’ve said but effort.
